intro: I create friendly, compelling user-interfaces for digital products. I can work in prototyping tools for handover to front-end devs or in HTML and CSS.
From simple logo design to more complete branding work. I collaborate with clients to find strong, usable visual identities.
Simplicity is hard. I can help you to curate or create icons that communicate complex or abstract ideas to your users.
My illustration work is most often vector art, but I will work with whatever tool is right for the job - from layered photoshop compositions to 3D models.
I can bring designs to life from animated logos and idents to educational and explainer videos.
